hero.headline: 24/7 On-Spot Car & Bike Mechanic Repair Service
hero.subheadline: Experience the best car service in Kolkata
hero.description: Look no further! Get a free personalized quote for your car and enjoy genuine spares, transparent pricing, and doorstep pick-up.

usp.title: Free Pick & Drop
usp.description: Relax while our logistics crew handles vehicle pick-up and drop-off.

usp.title: Plan Your Service
usp.description: Choose from curated packages or custom jobs at your convenience.

usp.title: Real-Time Updates
usp.description: Stay informed with live job cards and technician notes.

usp.title: Honest Pricing
usp.description: Upfront, itemised estimates with no hidden charges.

whyUs.title: 100% Genuine OEM/OES Spares
whyUs.description: Certified suppliers and audited inventory ensure every replacement part is original.

whyUs.title: Highly-Skilled Mechanics
whyUs.description: Factory-trained technicians specialising in multi-brand diagnostics.

whyUs.title: Live Service Tracking
whyUs.description: Track every milestone with photos, videos, and approvals within the app.

testimonials.name: Harsh Mahajan
testimonials.headline: Extremely satisfied with the service!
testimonials.message: My experience with Car Service Wale was excellent. Got my car painted at a competitive price with timely updates throughout the process.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.headline: Trustworthy and prompt
testimonials.message: Doorstep pick-up was on time, and the technicians explained every job in detail. I loved the transparent job card.

testimonials.name: Rahul Verma
testimonials.headline: Great value for money
testimonials.message: Genuine spares, fair pricing, and proactive communication. Highly recommend their periodic maintenance packages.

benefits.title: Select the perfect service
benefits.description: Browse curated packages from the Car Service Wale portfolio.

benefits.title: Schedule free doorstep pick-up
benefits.description: Choose the slot that works for you and we handle the rest.

benefits.title: Track progress in real-time
benefits.description: Approve jobs and monitor progress from the mobile app.

benefits.title: Refer and earn rewards
benefits.description: Invite friends to unlock complimentary services and wallet credits.

process.description: Comprehensive diagnostics isolate the root cause of every issue.
Skilled mechanics execute repairs with precision and genuine spares.
Post-service quality checks ensure every parameter exceeds standards.
Convenient digital payments via UPI, cards, net banking, and wallets.

appPromo.title: We are just one tap away
appPromo.description: This app is available for your smartphone. Track jobs, approve estimates, and chat with our support team.
